name: Hellovrworld
tagline: Tutorial to say Hello World to VR through Unity3D / Gear VR
body:
### "Hello VR World".
Hello VR World is in late Alpha. It is accompaniment to a tutorial of the same name, and is a beginner's Unity tutorial for Gear VR by a novice. Mistakes are expected, welcome feedback. 

### About the Project
Once you have finished, “Hello VR World” for Gear VR will contain a 3-D, stereoscopic world (which for once is truly what you make of it) and an animated character who waves at the World and says “Hello VR World” when you gaze directly at her.  In addition, you will learn how to create a multiverse of worlds like your first world, simply by gazing and then tapping on the Gear VR touchpad and ex nihilo generating, with apologies to Disney’s Aladdin, “A Whole New World.”  


### Authors and Contributors
@RemedialRobotics - Dan Lesser

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Pages? Will be linking here to the tutorial or [contact support](https://github.com/contact) and we’ll help you sort it out.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
